resources.string: %s remaining, about %s left based on your usage
Can\'t charge via USB. Use the charger that came with your device.

The computer\'s RSA key fingerprint is:\n%1$s
The user currently signed in to this device can\'t turn on USB debugging. To use this feature, switch to the primary user.
Can\'t save screenshot due to limited storage space
Taking screenshots isn\'t allowed by the app or your organization
Install Android File Transfer app for Mac
The data limit you set has been reached. You are no longer using mobile data.\n\nIf you resume, charges may apply for data usage.
Screen is locked in landscape orientation.
Screen is locked in portrait orientation.
Screen is now locked in landscape orientation.
Screen is now locked in portrait orientation.
Touch & hold icons for more options
Drag here to use split screen
Drag right to quickly switch apps
You won\'t be disturbed by sounds and vibrations, except from alarms, reminders, events, and callers you specify. You\'ll still hear anything you choose to play including music, videos, and games.
You won\'t be disturbed by sounds and vibrations, except from alarms. You\'ll still hear anything you choose to play including music, videos, and games.
This blocks ALL sounds and vibrations, including from alarms, music, videos, and games. You\'ll still be able to make phone calls.
This blocks ALL sounds and vibrations, including from alarms, music, videos, and games.
This device is managed by your organization
Swipe from icon for voice assist
Total silence. This will also silence screen readers.
All apps and data in this session will be deleted.
Do you want to continue your session?
To delete apps and data, remove guest user
When you add a new user, that person needs to set up their space.\n\nAny user can update apps for all other users.
All apps and data of this user will be deleted.
%s will start capturing everything that\'s displayed on your screen.
Do Not Disturb is hiding notifications

Device is managed by your organization

Your device is managed by %1$s.

Your admin can monitor and manage settings, corporate access, apps, data associated with your device, and your device's location information.

For more information, contact your admin.

Your device is managed by your organization.

Your admin can monitor and manage settings, corporate access, apps, data associated with your device, and your device's location information.

For more information, contact your admin.
Your organization installed a certificate authority on this device. Your secure network traffic may be monitored or modified.
Your organization installed a certificate authority in your work profile. Your secure network traffic may be monitored or modified.
A certificate authority is installed on this device. Your secure network traffic may be monitored or modified.
Your admin has turned on network logging, which monitors traffic on your device.
You\'re connected to %1$s, which can monitor your network activity, including emails, apps, and websites.

Your admin has turned on network logging, which monitors traffic on your device.\n\nFor more information, contact your admin.
You gave an app permission to set up a VPN connection.\n\nThis app can monitor your device and network activity, including emails, apps, and websites.

Your work profile is managed by %1$s.

Your admin is capable of monitoring your network activity including emails, apps, and websites.

For more information, contact your admin.

You're also connected to a VPN, which can monitor your network activity.

Your work profile is managed by %1$s. The profile is connected to %2$s, which can monitor your work network activity, including emails, apps, and websites.\n\nFor more information, contact your admin.

Your work profile is managed by %1$s. The profile is connected to %2$s, which can monitor your work network activity, including emails, apps, and websites.\n\nYou\'re also connected to %3$s, which can monitor your personal network activity.
Device will stay locked until you manually unlock

This keeps it in view until you unpin. Touch & hold Back and Home to unpin.
This keeps it in view until you unpin. Touch & hold Overview to unpin.
This keeps it in view until you unpin. Touch & hold Home to unpin.

To unpin this screen, touch & hold Back and Home buttons

Fun for some but not for all
System UI Tuner gives you extra ways to tweak and customize the Android user interface. These experimental features may change, break, or disappear in future releases. Proceed with caution.
These experimental features may change, break, or disappear in future releases. Proceed with caution.
Congrats! System UI Tuner has been added to Settings
Remove System UI Tuner from Settings and stop using all of its features?"
Application is not installed on your device
Show clock seconds in the status bar. May impact battery life.
Allow long-press customize in Quick Settings
To connect your keyboard with your tablet, you first have to turn on Bluetooth.

With power notification controls, you can set an importance level from 0 to 5 for an app's notifications. 

Level 5 
- Show at the top of the notification list 
- Allow full screen interruption 
- Always peek 

Level 4 
- Prevent full screen interruption 
- Always peek 

Level 3 
- Prevent full screen interruption 
- Never peek 

Level 2 
- Prevent full screen interruption 
- Never peek 
- Never make sound and vibration 

Level 1 
- Prevent full screen interruption 
- Never peek 
- Never make sound or vibrate 
- Hide from lock screen and status bar 
- Show at the bottom of the notification list 

Level 0 
- Block all notifications from the app
You won\'t see these notifications anymore
You usually dismiss these notifications. \nKeep showing them?
Keep showing notifications from this app?
These notifications can\'t be turned off
displaying over other apps on your screen
Battery Saver not available during charging
Exit do not disturb on volume up
Hold and drag to add tiles
App may not work with split-screen.
App may not work on a secondary display.
App does not support launch on secondary displays.
If you don\'t want %s to use this feature, tap to open settings and turn it off.
Changing the theme requires a restart.
Phone turned off due to heat
Your phone is now running normally

Your phone was too hot, so it turned off to cool down. Your phone is now running normally.

Your phone may get too hot if you:
	• Use resource-intensive apps (such as gaming, video, or navigation apps)
	• Download or upload large files
	• Use your phone in high temperatures
Some features limited while phone cools down
Your phone will automatically try to cool down. You can still use your phone, but it may run slower.\n\nOnce your phone has cooled down, it will run normally.
Do Not Disturb was turned on by an automatic rule (%s).
Do Not Disturb was turned on by an app (%s).
Do Not Disturb was turned on by an automatic rule or app.
Tap for details on battery and data usage
You won\t have access to data or the internet through %s. Internet will only be available via Wi-Fi.
Because an app is obscuring a permission request, Settings cant verify your response.
Allow %1$s to show slices from any app
Turn on automatically when battery is at %d%%
Battery Saver will turn on automatically once battery goes below %d%%.
